CustomField.description: Leave unchecked if you don't want Capture to download Profiles. SCAN will still create Profile component records in the MCL. Leaving unchecked will greatly enhance performance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Leave unchecked if you don't want Capture to download Profiles. SCAN will still create Profile component records in the MCL. Leaving unchecked will greatly enhance performance.
CustomField.label: Include Profiles
